title: ZAWNAWLNA
lyrics:
Mal min sawm turin 89
Mala vakvaiin ka lo haw 251
Malsawm ruahte a tla ang a 47
Malsawm tinreng hnar lo kal la 264
Malsawmna thisen tuikhurin 225
Mangang leh lungngaia tan i tumte hian 48
Manganna ka tawhte zinga 430
Mi an khenbeh chu in en chuan nunna a awm 441
Mi bawrhsawmte chuan daktawr an ngai a 517
Mi sual ka ni Lalpa min ngaidam rawh 377
Mi thianghlim kalna kawng hlui kha zawhin 500
Mi thianghlimte lenna khawpui chu 516
Mi thianghlimte u enteh u 67
Mihring zingah a lo kal 88
Min hruainaah chuan ka kal ang 254
Min ngaidam rawh aw Lalpa min ngaidam rawh 520
Min vengtu chu Lalpa a ni 28
Muan muanna kim Khawvel sual thimah hian 418
